Package de.dennisfalk.homeconnect2semp.controller

Class SettingsController

java.lang.Object
de.dennisfalk.homeconnect2semp.controller.SettingsController
@Controller public class SettingsController extends Object
Controller for settings and oAuth2 authentication

  • Method Details

    • authorize

      @GetMapping("/oauth2/authorize") public org.springframework.web.servlet.view.RedirectView authorize()
      Method for calling the home connect authorization endpoint
      Returns:
      RedirectView to the Home Connect authorization page

    • code

      @GetMapping("/oauth2/code") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView code(@RequestParam("code") String code, @RequestParam(value="grant_type",required=false) String grantType, @RequestParam(value="state",required=false) String state)
      Method for processing the authorization answer from the home connect api
      Parameters:
      code - authorization code
      grantType - all granted access points
      state - individual code string for security purpose
      Returns:
      ModelAndView to token method

    • token

      @GetMapping("/oauth2/token") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView token()
      Method for token request. This method will be called after the authorization answer from the home connect api
      Returns:
      ModelAndView settings

    • tokenRefresh

      @GetMapping("/oauth2/refresh") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView tokenRefresh()
      Method for refreshing the access token. The access token is 24h valid
      Returns:
      ModelAndView settings

    • save

      @PostMapping("/oauth2/save") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView save(@ModelAttribute OAuth2Provider oAuth2Provider)
      Method for saving the home connect settings
      Parameters:
      oAuth2Provider - object with connection settings
      Returns:
      ModelAndView settings

    • save

      @PostMapping("/sempmanager/save") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView save(@ModelAttribute SEMPManager sempManager)
      Method for saving the semp settings
      Parameters:
      sempManager - object with semp settings from html form
      Returns:
      ModelAndView settings

      @GetMapping("/oauth2/delete") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView deleteOAuth2()

      ModelAndView settings

      @PostMapping("/user/updatePassword") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView changeUserPassword(@RequestParam("newPassword") String newPassword)
      Method for updating the user password

      newPassword - the new password
      Returns:
